attributes.action: Support the removal of Boris Johnson as the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: Deselection of Boris Johnson by seeking a vote of no confidence in his leadership.
attributes.background: Recent events have demonstrated that Boris Johnson cannot be trusted, and clearly unfit to hold the Office of Prime Minister

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
